description: A two-level concrete hybrid home designed for buyers who want separation of space. The main level offers bright, open living with high ceilings, a modern kitchen, and a flexible bedroom well-suited to guests or a dedicated home office. Upstairs, the layout is intentionally zoned with a primary and ensuite, guest bedroom, den, and a full bath—creating privacy and comfort without wasted space. 2 private outdoor spaces, AC, 2 parking stalls, and dedicated storage support everyday practicality. This home includes full access to amenities—2 fitness facilities, 2lounges, and shared outdoor spaces. Located in Vancouver’s River District — walking distance to riverfront trails, shops, services, and dining. Designed for condo buyers seeking a concrete build and multi-level living.
